name: OutBreak: The Escape
description: OutBreak: The Escape is a Fps Survival Horror game, You play as a Marshall as you try to save your family While trying to escape a viral outbreak that occurred overnight in your hometown. Can you save your family and escape the OutBreak?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 280 or ATI analog DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.60GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 280 or ATI analog DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
